name: Deacom, Inc.
tag_list: erp, software, manufacturing-software, erp-software, lot-tracking-software, inventory-software, production-software, formulation-software, paint-erp-software, pharmaceutical-erp-software, coatings-erp-software, chemical-erp-software, adhesive-erp-software
overview:
Deacom, Inc. produces an integrated accounting and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software system for mid-to-large sized manufacturers of building components, modular buildings, specialty chemicals, pharmaceuticals, paint and coatings, adhesives and sealants, cosmetics, and food and beverages.

The DEACOM ERP System simply manages all areas of a manufacturing business - from production and inventory control, to order entry and accounting - giving you a comprehensive view of your entire operation from one, configurable system.

Visit www.deacom.net to schedule an online demonstration, and learn how DEACOM can simplify your complex business process issues today.
